author: abrinke1
body:
Part 3 of a series of PRs from @jiafulow (following #22820 and #22839 ) which will bring the EMTF emulator up-to-date for 2018 running. This PR includes configurable modifications to the EMTF track-building sequence which reduce the rate without efficiency loss, especially in high-pileup conditions.  Configurable track-building parameters as follows:
* Window of BX included in same track adjustable (1 - 3 BX)
* Reduced theta window between LCTs in Zone 0 (high eta)
* Fix to theta ambiguity when two LCTs are in the same chamber
* Removal of two-station tracks with LCTs in different BX
* Improved track mode <---> uGMT quality mapping

Best regards,
Andrew
title: EMTF April 2018 emulator update part 3 - track-building for 2018
